root: ^Soon. Once this last roller coaster ride is over.
^You know, I think it's been a good day.
^And funny enough, I completely forgot about Reginald.
^Huh, that's odd. But you remember him now.
^Yeah, he's a good Ring Master. The shows are fun. I don't know how he treats his staff though.
^Yes, I think so. There's a lot here to write about. Do you mind if I write about you and Bethany?
^Not at all. I look forward to reading it.
